trans-unit.source: Flying Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, they gain indestructible until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Flying Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, they gain indestructible until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: "No single arrow can pierce an entire flock."
trans-unit.target: "No single arrow can pierce an entire flock."

trans-unit.source: Hexproof Creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: Hexproof Creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.

trans-unit.source: It is ancient, immense, and irresistible.
trans-unit.target: It is ancient, immense, and irresistible.

trans-unit.source: Lifelink When Vengeant Vampire dies, destroy target creature an opponent controls and you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: Lifelink When Vengeant Vampire dies, destroy target creature an opponent controls and you gain 4 life.

trans-unit.source: "Those who stood in my path now lay behind me."
trans-unit.target: "Those who stood in my path now lay behind me."

trans-unit.source: Flying When Immortal Phoenix dies, return it to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: Flying When Immortal Phoenix dies, return it to its owner's hand.

trans-unit.source: Their fires burn quietly, allowing the phoenixes to glide silently through the canyon.
trans-unit.target: Their fires burn quietly, allowing the phoenixes to glide silently through the canyon.

trans-unit.source: Trample Whenever Rampaging Brontodon attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each land you control.
trans-unit.target: Trample Whenever Rampaging Brontodon attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each land you control.

trans-unit.source: Not even the tallest tree stands a chance against the underside of a dinosaur's foot.
trans-unit.target: Not even the tallest tree stands a chance against the underside of a dinosaur's foot.
